mapper.insert: insert into car (comp_id, car_modelname, car_name, car_number, car_capa, car_option, car_detail, car_rentprice, car_regdate, car_file) values (#{comp_id}, #{car_modelname}, #{car_name}, #{car_number}, #{car_capa}, #{car_option}, #{car_detail}, #{car_rentprice}, now(), #{car_file})
mapper.update: update car set comp_id=#{comp_id}, car_modelname=#{car_modelname}, car_name=#{car_name}, car_number=#{car_number}, car_capa=#{car_capa}, car_option=#{car_option}, car_detail=#{car_detail}, car_rentprice=#{car_rentprice}, car_file=#{car_file} where car_regid=#{car_regid}
mapper.select: select * from car order by car_regid
